siteMetadata.title: DoubleDutch Developer Platform

next.excerpt:
What is the DoubleDutch Developer Platform (DDDP)? DDDP allows DoubleDutch customers and 3rd party developers to build extensions that can be installed
to any DoubleDutch event app. What is an extension? An extension is a self-contained experienceâ€¦
